review: This movie was not fantastic . I really found it not easy to enjoy such a film . My eyes are still healing from the fire that was lit in it by the movie .
This movie was not as terrible as I thought it would be . It turns out that my eyes were not destroyed by what I thought was going to be the worst movie in my life .
'GREAT FILM' they said . I find myself in awe at how wonderful a job the film makers did in thinning my wallet . I recommend this film to anyone who wants to watch 2 hours of their life doing nothing
